评论概述: The Perfect Blend of Comfort and Style
评论详情: These pants are an absolute wardrobe staple! The lack of a cuff at the bottom gives them a polished look, making them easy to dress up for work or a night out, but they’re just as perfect for lounging or running errands. Fits true to size.  The stretchy, soft material makes them incredibly comfortable—I could wear them all day without any fuss. I love them so much that I now have them in multiple colors, and every pair fits like a dream.  If you’re looking for versatile pants that combine style and comfort, these are a must-have. Highly recommend grabbing more than one!

I have been searching for a replacement of pants like this forever.  I own a pair from a much more expensive brand - that brand was hard to get off and on and not stretchy.  I took a shot and ordered these in XS Petite.  For reference, I'm 5'2" and 102 - most of that 102 is in the bottom half, legs and rear :).  They are super comfortable and stretchy.  I can wear these to the office with a cute sweater and loafers and still feel like I'm in PJs all day but look like I'm not!  They would be great for travel too.  They fit my hips perfectly.  The one thing I'd change, which won't apply to a lot of you, is that I'd make the length about an inch shorter for the petite size XS.  I have short legs so the length doesn't look like the picture of the model.  They hit maybe a 1/2' above my shoes which looks off.  If I roll them up once it's the perfect length but looks weird because it isn't a full cuff.  If I roll them up twice to make a real cuff then they are too short.  There's no way I'm sending these back!  I plan to go down to the tailor and have her take an inch off.  I looked in to ordering in the XS regular but the hip and waist are larger so the fit wouldn't be as nice for me.  I'll keep these and fix the length for me.update 3/23/2024 - I kept thinking I should give the regular (non petite) XS a shot so I ordered a pair in dark blue.  I have to say, I can't tell a difference in the width of the hips which is good.  I thought, based on the size chart, that they would be much bigger.  But they look just as good and the length allows me to wear them as long pants (slightly cover the back of my shoes) or roll them twice to create a full cuff for the perfect cropped length.  I have short legs and a long torso so the regular length looks nothing like the model on me. They fit like full on regular length pants. The petite comes much closer but still not exactly like the picture.  Over all, I really like them both.  I'm keeping both.

As the original pants I purchased were a large (based on the reviews I read) I  wrote that the were too large and unflattering. I received the medium overnight, amazing and they fit very well. A teeny bit tight at the waist bc it's large, (40 in) but they are amazing. The material is soft and spectacular-sturdy and very expensive feeling. Because they are the correct size they are very flattering.  I'm not the type of person that buys pants in multiple colours because I take very good care of my clothes and already have a pair of pants in blue so I don't see myself buying other colours but I do love these. Very comfortable.  More than just travel pants. They can be dressed up or down-truly a great buy and so inexpensive.

I have 4 or 5 pairs of these and wear them practically every day. They are soft and comfortable but dog hair doesn't cling to it like cotton or leggings. They're stetchy yet tight in the right places. Way better than any name brand version I have of similar styles. Doesnt shrink, decent pocket sizes and high value for cost.

This is a great pair of ankle pants they can be used as a jogger or as dress pants.  Thin fabric that breathes, shines enough to make it look sleek.  I’m short so ankle pants fit as regular pants.  So comfy

评论概述: A little different fit than the photo
评论详情: These show underwear lines bad! Unless you’re commando or thonging it the lines will show even with no show underwear. The midsection bunches up and fits weird I feel like it gives me a fupa even though I don’t have one. However, they are very breezy and lightweight, comfortable and a good length for even someone with long legs. They are okay. Not my fav but, they are okay.
Well made, soft fabric.  True to size.

I bought three different "yoga"/"work" pants to see which one is best. The Ajisai brand runs small; I usually wear size M (8/10) but needed a size L based on reviews, which turned out to be a good choice. The fit is right, though their sizing is off. The quality is comparable to other gym clothes. (My second choice)  The YYV brand has a unique style with a fake zipper flap, a small cut at the bottom of the legs, giving it a smart-casual look, and no elastic waistband. The fit around the waist is great and doesn’t restrict breathing, and the sizing is accurate. Petite friendly. (My first choice)  The CRZY Yoga brand has a tie-waist style like Ajisai. it’s not ideal for petite people as the length is too long and the waistband is too high. (My third choice)  Overall, all the pants are made of similar, stretchable material and can be styled as lounge wear, airport wear, or smart-casual outfits. Good pants for all seasons.

I knew this runs short and is good for petite but wow, it is shorter than I expected (I am only 5'1"). I wore it for the first time yesterday on the plane and it's mostly comfortable. The main reason I docked off 1 star is the pants do tend to ride up a bit onto my calves when I sit, which could get cold if the plane (or wherever I am) temperature is low.

Great for golf in cooler weather. I wash on delicate cycle and hang to dry. They dry in hours and no wrinkles. I'm 5'3" and the regular length hits me around my ankles.  I have them in black and grey.

评论概述: Feels like silk on your body
评论详情: Love these pants. Comfortable, quality material, hefty quality fabric w/o being hit bc it’s breathable. The color is a bit dull but it’s ok. These pants are office casual with yoga comfort. They feel so good to slip into.
Extremely comfortable, quality material
Distribution on point. Little dressey. Beautiful fit.

I love these pants and the subtle camo print. They are  true to size & very comfortable. The only negative (& why I only gave 4 ⭐️) was waiting for them to arrive. It took over a week and there was a delay.
This one did not fit great. The Small was a bit too big on me. The fabric feels substantial, and the pants are well made.

I have started wearing these instead of jeans..I am 71 5ft 4 and 190 lbs..these look so much better than jeans ..no lumps or bumps showing and soo comfortable..I have 4 pr of these..I wear a xl..they wash and dry great also. I just love them. The fabric is so soft and feels so good on.

评论概述: I love these pants! Fit great, comfortable. Perfect for each day. Dress up or down.
评论详情: Buy them now

These pants are really great!  The cut and quality are actually quite good for the price, especially if you're not into labels.  Soft, stretchy, with nice deep pockets that I could use for golf tees and balls without them falling out.  What I don't like about these is how tight the elastic waist is. I am 5 feet tall and my hips measure 34.5" on a "big" day.  I purchased XS and they are just a tad loose except for the waist, which hits me above my belly-button, just under my ribs.  It's very uncomfortable and seems unnecessary given the drawstring.  I would cut the elastic however it appears to be sewn to the waistband - another detail I didn't expect for the price - and I don't want to rip the waistband.  If I go up a size, the pants would be huge on me.  I cannot wear high-waist pants if the rise is too high and these are too high for me.  Petite is more than adjusting the hem, the rise should be adjusted too because my legs are "long" for my height.

I’m 5’3” and 140 lbs with athletic legs. I ordered a large, and while it’s a bit loose in the waist, the drawstring helps tighten it, so it’s not a problem. The pants fit well overall and aren’t too snug on my thighs. The length hits just on my ankles. I can’t speak about the durability or how well they’ll hold up after washing yet, but I love these pants so far. I bought them in black.

I absolutely love these pants. I have been wearing the black ones for at least 2 years and I just bought the navy blue as they finally make them in XS. I am 5'3", 107 and the XS fit great. I dress these up or down. The black pair is pilling some and look a little run down but I have worn them at least 100 times and have washed them a bunch. I will definitely keep buying these!

I am a pretty standard size 8, and medium fits.  The good: They do not wrinkle, period. They seem impervious to dirt--even food dropped on these pants just flicks away. They fit me really well and look nice. They do not look like "travel pants."  RE not like travel pants, there are only two deep front pockets. Good for change or a key but you would not want to put bulkier items in there.  The one thing I don't like is that the elastic waist is very tight. It's difficult to pull them past my hips. Once they're up, they fit my waist perfectly. But if there isn't much difference between your waist and your hips, the elastic might be too tight.  And a quibble: I found choosing the size, color and ankle style pretty confusing. I was hoping for the tulip hem, got straight instead. Not a big deal.

评论概述: I wish they offered the petite length in more colors
评论详情: I really like these pants. They’re comfortable, the fabric is flattering and doesn’t show off my cellulite and how out of shape I am. It’s thick and definitely not sheer. It’s stretchy, but hard to describe. I don’t think I have anything else like what these pants are made out of. I like that I can wear them with sneakers and a tee shirt, or put on a nice top to be a little more dressed up. I guess on me they kinda look a bit more like frumpy old lady pants, but honestly I don’t care. I’m 43 and I guess I am kinda frumpy, lol. The length on me is obviously not like it is in the listing photos. I’m 5’ 1” and have a longer torso and shorter legs, so everything is long on me. They’re still just barely cropped pants, and I think they look cute with my clogs. I’m not sure how much I’ll wear them in the winter, but we’ll see. I really love that they’ve got deep pockets. Like, I can fit my entire iPhone XS Max in there with room to spare. If only all women’s pants had pockets like these. I liked these so much I went ahead and ordered a different style of Ajisai joggers that aren’t offered in this shorter length. I’m hoping they’ll work out, but I suppose I can always have them tailored if they’re too long, but I really love them otherwise. I’d absolutely buy these in more colors if they offered them in the petite length. I’m just not interested in navy, although I may buy a second pair in black when they’re restocked. Finding cute pants when you’re short is so difficult. Especially when you don’t like to actually go out shopping and try things on. I’ve worn them several times now, and I’ve washed them and put them in the dryer on low, and they look perfect. They don’t collect lint and they don’t wrinkle easily. I’d definitely recommend them. Just be aware that if you’re short and not as skinny as you could be, (like me, I’m a size 10, creeping towards an 8) then you too are likely to look a bit frumpy in them rather than looking cool and statuesque like the model wearing them in the photos for the listing.

评论概述: AJISAI Petite/Regular Women's 7/8 Joggers Travel Pants with Pockets Lounge Casual Stretch pants
评论详情: I really like this material. It's super soft & comfortable. I work in & out of the heat all day, they keep me cool & dry. (Florida) I bought the black and the gray. Blue was not available in Petite, so I ordered it in regular length. I like them too! I wish they came in white & more colors. These are so comfortable and cute. I wear to work with a short sleeve Henley. I've also styled it with a beach sneaker and a quick dry sport top. Don't hesitate, you won't regret! For reference, I'm 5'3.5" I ordered 2 in petite large and they fit like a true 7/8 pant, that is they're above the ankle and show off your shoe! The regular large came to the top of my sneaker, not too long, not too short. I have an apple 🍎  shape. I normally wear a medium in this type (stretch waist band) but ordered L & PL based on reviews.

The fabric feels great - nice and stretchy, breathable and not too clingy. I felt comfortable, but also put together, on one of our first 80+ degree days.  I'm often between a medium and a large, and went with the large due to reviews. I'm glad I did because the waistband is quite tight - it's a thick elastic so it was comfortable and didn't fold over or create an unflattering "roll" but the medium would have been too small.

I bought these pants several months ago but just tried them out on our most recent trip. They are FABULOUS travel pants and honestly will be great for running errands, going out to eat, shopping, etc. They are extremely comfortable, look great on, and are as comfortable, if not more so, than leggings! I highly recommend!!!
Good quality fabric, great fit

These are my favorite pants and perfect for almost everywhere. I wore these to court, work, dates, errands you name it.  Even have gained weight and they still flatter me. I bought size small petite, 5’3, 130-150lbs and they’re still my favorite pair of pants. Please make more color options in petite!!

评论概述: These pants are not like they used to be
评论详情: I got my first pair of these pants around 3 years ago. Similar to the many reviews, I got them because they are stretchy, comfy, and thick. They hold their shape really well and look good. I just bought another pair ( one size bigger to be able to wear thermals under) and they are so different. Although they materials say they are the same, these new pants are thinner, do not hold their shape as the older pants, the color is not as dark , and they have a slightly shine to them. For the price, I would NOT recommend these pants as I have gotten similar thickness/ pants for less money. I got these because they are thicker than other joggers/pants but the new ones are a disappointment.

I absolutely love these pants! They are very comfortable but also are cute for a casual outfit. I really like the slightly loose looking fit. I wear them all the time! I will definitely be purchasing more!
I just purchased my second pair after having the first pair for about 4 years. These are very nice quality and I can get away with wearing them to work.
They fit true to size and are VERY cozy!  Just what I wanted.

Yoga pants as street-ware are over, but casual comfort isn’t. These are my new go-to. I purchased them to travel in, but realized as soon as I put them on that they are perfect for most occasions. Very comfortable. They look great on. Like other reviews said, a bit tight in the waist but I wear them all day and they aren’t digging in or making me uncomfortable so no complains. I’m 5’2” but have long legs so ordered the reg length and they fit like a standard pant length. I’m keeping these and also ordering the petite for the above ankle look.

Love these pants! I appreciate the fact that they come in a petite version. The fabric is buttery and has a good amount of stretch. I am between a medium and a large (5’3”, 160lbs), but I’m glad I sized up since I didn’t want them to be too fitted.

评论概述: Just wish these had a full length option
评论详情: Love this brand for joggers. I am 5 ft 4 in and these fit as 7/8 length as advertised. I am not a huge fan of cropped pants, so I wish there was a full-length option. However, I like these well enough that I have them in grey and navy. Incredibly stretchy and comfortable. To my taller friends, you will probably not like these because they will be way too short for you.

I almost never leave reviews but I feel compelled to share that these are my absolute favorite pants for travel/walking/work/existing. Nice n' stretchy, perfect for accommodating those pandemic pounds I can't seem to lose. The sort of sporty but sleek fabric is so easy to dress up with a nice blouse tucked in for work or pair with a jean jacket and t-shirt to traipse around town.  I ordered my first pair well over a year ago and think I now have 4 pairs? One pair has gotten a little warped in the waistband, and the fabric of my oldest pair has gotten a bit pilled up in the inner thighs (as will happen for us more voluptuous folks) but for the price I'm overall really impressed with the quality.  And just SO comfy and lightweight for summertime wear. I only wish they made the same cut in a slightly thicker fabric for colder months. I probably wouldn't wear anything else.
Use it to travel, find it very comfortable.
liked comfort
Very quality material, stretch nicely and fit perfectly! Very comfortable and expensive look! Bought two pairs already!

As a petite lady, finding a high-quality pair of pants can be a huge ordeal. Most large clothing retailers don't adequately tailor to petite women and this makes finding a nice pair of pants a headache for me.  When I found these pants, I was pleasantly surprised that they offer petite sizes at a fairly affordable price. After taking the measurements into consideration, I purchased 2 pairs of the black joggers in a petite medium and petite small. I am 5'1" and weigh 131 pounds so I wasn't 100% sure where I would land between these sizes.  The pants arrived quickly with Amazon Prime shipping and had no issues. The joggers feel silky to the touch and are extremely comfortable. Most importantly, they fit beautifully! Though both the medium and small petite sizes could work on me, I opted to keep the small size because it looks a bit more tailored/less oversized. Despite the fact that these are joggers, they actually look very sharp and I would feel comfortable wearing these in a casual office setting without feeling sloppy. If you're a petite girl who has struggled to find joggers that fit properly, I definitely recommend these!

评论概述: Great looking with very cool fabric
评论详情: Let me start by saying the waist is very narrow. I was able to get them up and on, but the waist is way too tight right now. I am in the process of dieting. I did not return them because they really are sharp. You can wear them all year around, very versatile. Definitely worth a try.

Comfortable and versatile. These are so comfortable and fit nice. Not too loose or tight. I wear them with both athletic shoes and dress shoes depending on the top. I have them in Grey, black and blue. I wear them almost every day. The length is nice. I like the 7/8 inch size. I have long legs and they hit right above my ankle. I wash them and hang dry. Great pants. Highly recommend. And nope not paid for my review.

评论概述: Elastic waist band is really large
评论详情: The joggers were full length on me even though they are petite.  I find the elastic waistband excessively wide 2”.  Prior reviews indicate that the product runs small and suggest sizing up - this is true.  I kept the pants but would not purchase again.
This has been  love at first try, I'm petite and it fits perfect! I will be ordering more. I did go one size up based on reviews. The details make it so much better. Get it ladies!!

评论概述: Quality fabric, but the sizing varies wildly
评论详情: I have a dark olive pair I bought a few years ago that I LOVE. Tried buying black and navy, and they all fit differently. Fabric is thick, waistband is sturdy but comfortable.

评论概述: Too long for crop pants but feel fantastic!!
评论详情: I bought these for work and the fabric feels fantastic - like butter - next to my skin. They are so soft and comfortable and fit true to size on me EXCEPT they’re too long to be called crop. My problem is a big tummy but the xl fit just fine. I have a thin butt, hips, and legs but the fit was also good in those areas.  Im 5’6” and pants are never too long but these made me feel frumpy being longer than ankle length, but  i kept them and rolled them up. I’m getting ready to order another color in same size except petite which says they’re 3” shorter so i can achieve a trendier look!

I am 5 ft 1 in tall and weigh 188 lbs. These Ajisai travel jogger pants in size petite xxl fit me perfectly and that's unusual for Amazon pants. What I like: The pants are soft and silky and very well made. The elastic waist band is snug and about 2 inches wide. The pockets are deep and will easily hold my cell phone. I like them very much and anticipate wearing them often when shopping or lunching. Cons: Unfortunately, because I am very short, the hem of the pants come to the tops of my feet. However, I can easily hem them in the future. I wish Amazon carried more petite fashions.

A great pair of casual/yoga pants. Perfect for travel, an informal workplace, or any everyday activity. Quality fabric, finished seams, deep pockets that are tacked down at both ends of the opening. Very nice at a good price point. I returned them only because I thought they made my hips look too wide. :)
Great value quality was good.  Thought they ran too big.
These petite small pants fit perfectly. They travel well without wrinkling. So they always look good and can be dressed up or down. Good for every day and or travel.
So comfortable
Great fit and so comfy. The fabric is very shiny which makes them look cheap.

评论概述: Size down if between sizes; fabric nice but snags on velcro
评论详情: I’m 5’5 and 155. Ordered a large so it would be comfy - they were full length and sloppy. Reordered medium which fit perfectly and look just like the photo.  I have a broken ankle with a non-weight bearing walking cast. These are perfect for easy maneuvering while standing on one foot. The only complaint is that the Velcro on the boot has snagged the knee of the pant - my other pants have not had this issue. I still wear them all the time though because they are so comfortable.  I wish they had a zipper pocket that could hold my phone, and more usable back pockets. Side pockets will hold a phone but not securely enough for travel or a lot of motion. I’ve had it fall out more than once around the house.  But still a great and super comfortable travel/casual pant that looks nice (way better than leggings on a 50ish woman).

I really like these pants! I have it in two colors and it is very flattering on my build. I’m slender, around 115 pounds, 5’21/2 and it fits me perfectly. They are just the right length, comfortable and not too light or heavy. My only hope is that the company would offer it in more colors because it is limited. I ordered another brand similar to this which I like too, however the length is just a tad short. These are just the right length for me. I especially like wearing them when I golf and travel. Give it a try!
Gave 4 only because didn't expect the waste band to be so large and thick. The pants are breezy and comfortable

These pants are well made but there is no stretch in the fabric.  They run small with elastic that is even smaller than the pants.  I am 5 ft tall and weigh 125 pounds and the medium was too small.  I could wear them but they would be very tight and uncomfortable.  I have sent them back…
Love that they are truly petite. Though one pair pilled. Any one else have that happen?

These pants are made for smaller shorter people. They are very nice and I like them a lot, but they are very short waisted and short in length. I am 5’9 and I don’t mind if they are ankle length, but they are above that. Please make these a bit longer in length and in crotch/waist. They would fit more people and fit better.
I'm 5'1" and about 155#.  These are a size XL petite.  I think they fit good. The fabric is kind of silky and on the thin side.  Very very comfortable!

评论概述: Not for someone tall except to bum around in.
评论详情: I like the material.  It had some stretch and was not sheer at all.  Has a nice sheen to it.  My friend got some and they fit her perfectly and she can even wear them as dress pants.  She is 5'3".  I am 5'10" and they hit at the top of my ankles so they are too short for me.  I will wear them around the house since they are so comfortable.

I didn't want to wear these as flood pants, so I bought the regular rather than the petite option. I'm 5'1" with short legs and a short torso, and the length hit me just below the top of my foot. Love the natural waist even though it shows a bit of my belly.

评论概述: If you are petite size up on this one for loose comfortable fit
评论详情: I am 5'4" tall and 150 lbs. Most of my girth is in my waist, unfortunately.  I wear a true Large in all pants. In this style, I originally bought the "Petite" Large. As you can see in the photos as marked, the large looks like a Medium on me, too tight and short? I also don't like how they hug my thighs as I expect joggers to feel loose and comfortable. The large felt close to wearing leggings on me.  I ended up repurchasing an X-Large and it was much more comfortable and appears much better on me including the length.  This is a very nice designed pant, the fabric is like high end sportswear.  This pant would be great for traveling not only to wear on the plane but fit well and light in carry on luggage. I hope my review helps someone else!

I am 4’9” and these pants fit perfectly without alteration. Even though they are 7/8, I wear them to my ankles/shoes. They are flattering with a slim fit and the elastic waist holds the pants up even when there are items in the handy pockets. The fabric is safe but durable and overall very comfortable. I might buy a third pair.
Great fit and so comfortable! Can be worn to work with a sweater or top for a casual look.

These pants are SO comfortable and are perfect for travel.  They don’t look overtly casual and don’t wrinkle. I’m 5’6” and wear an 8/10, went with a Large Petite just to make sure I got the cropped look with the length and they’re perfect.  If you’re between sizes in the waist I would go up, if you’re between sizes in length I would go down.

评论概述: Love these for my petite frame!
评论详情: These are perfect! Short enough for my little legs, not too tight or loose. My only issue is they don't have any of the lighter colors in the Petite Small. For reference, I am 4'10" tall and weigh 105 lbs. If I went with the XS, I believe the waist would be too tight. Even though it is elastic, it is rather snug.

I love these pants. I typically don't wear lounge clothes. I like to dress up daily. I like these pants because although they are the most comfortable pants I have ever worn they look sleek. These will be perfect for travel with a sweater or classic white button down shirt. I recently ended up unexpectedly in the hospital for observation. When I returned home these are the pants I put on because of it's comfortable waist and I have not taken them off which led me to buy a second pair. They are soft on the inside and outside. They look as if they are not going to pill. They will be perfect for long car rides which I have coming up in my near future and yet they look adorable on me. I sized up and it worked out great. I don't like pants fitting too tight around my thighs. I like a perfect straight leg and these are them in the next size up. The fabric is thick enough that I don't see my undies which is another pet peeve. You will not regret buying these pants. They are fantastic.
Great fit for we shorter ladies; have a little weight so not for really hot weather

评论概述: Cute pants but waistband is too small
评论详情: I bought these pants in navy . The material is soft and stretchy and the  pockets are a nice touch . However I feel it runs small in the elastic waistband . I typically wear a size 8/10 in jeans and pants but ordered a large in these pants in case the medium was clingy . I’m not sure if I’ll keep these since the waist just feels too tight .

评论概述: My favorite but petites always out of stock!
评论详情: These are my favorite travel pants. I'm only 5'2" and need the petites, but they always seem to be out of stock. I tried the regular 27" and had to return them.  This fabric is thick, smooth, doesn't pill, and drapes well.  I'm 122lbs, 35-30-36 and have bought both the PS and PM, depending on how loose I want them.
So comfy for a long airplane ride.  I am 5’3’ and they go to my ankles.

评论概述: Comfortable, easy and perfect for both at home & travel
评论详情: Purchased Medium, I'm 5 foot tall pear shaped and typically wear 8 on bottom and small on top.  These fit perfect both in length, at waist & stretch.  Wearing around the house or to run errands - they have enough stretch which makes them extremely comfortable to sit, walk around and they are not compression so I don't feel like my lower appendages are suffocating.  Also really easy to put on, again because there is no compression, these are easy to slide on and I don't have to wiggle back and forth to pull these up.  They come right above my belly button, so I would consider them high waisted.  Will be ordering at least one or two more pairs as these are also perfect for travel - especially when going overseas and running around cities, airports, etc.. If they dry fast, they will be perfect for travel.  We typically take an annual 2 week vacation & I just bring a carry on because we bounce around different cities, taking trains & in-out of airports & I need to be able to carry my own luggage if we have steps, and we don't like to check our luggage to avoid losing our items. These will be perfect because they can be washed & dry quickly.  Have not washed yet, will wash & update review.

评论概述: Great fit but material is ok
评论详情: I’m 5’3” and 150 lbs usually a size 6 or 8 and these fit perfect, not too tight.  I got the medium petite and they are the perfect crop length. My only issue is the material. It’s silky and soft, it feels like a bathing suit. Very casual. I do really like them but I thought it would be a thicker more structured pant like material instead of a yoga pant

I really like these pants, they have a lot of stretchy and a cooling effect to them. They are Capri length on me and I'm short. They do show panty lines though, if you wear regular bikini style underwear. And there's a drawstring so you can adjust the waist.

I have tried to find athletic type pants for years. All the name brands and none of them fit right. Found these through an Instagram influencer and they’re perfect! I am 5’4”,  135/40 pounds and wear a size 6 Jean, and a size 4 a little snug. I bought the petite medium as my legs are short and they’re perfect. I wanted a higher ankle length but I was surprised at how roomy these were. Great pants for travel. Super comfortable.

My pants came today and I love them. I’m 5’7 and 175 and the XL fits perfect. The material is silky and soft. It has great stretch and I can band and squat. Love them. Gave 4 stars because I ordered these pants but got the joggers with the cuff on the bottom. It’s fine, I ended up loving these.  *Update- I wore these to go out in the ice and they were perfect. No air got in. They were good at wind blocking. And they are warm. I’m glad I kept them, but I still want the other pair I ordered originally.

I bought these for traveling and they are light and comfortable and perfect for long plane/train rides (especially the drawstring waist )and don’t wrinkle and take up almost no room in my bag. They’re also perfect for everyday casual swear or even for a casual workplace.

评论概述: Traveled all over the world with these pants
评论详情: I LOVE these pants. I have three pairs of black and gray and tripped and tore them in vietnam :(. I have had them for 2.5 years. I am an xs 5'5 and 119 lbs. Purchasing in other colors. The only negative is they slide down and I have to pull them up to my waist LOL. Buy them, great for the price.
Just as pictured. True to size and oh so comfortable

评论概述: Comfy, stretch lounge pants that can be elevated!!  Great for covid times!
评论详情: Since covid, my wardrobe has shifted to tshirts, shorts and my remaining  closet collects dust. I have found that I need more loose, stretchy pants (as yoga pants aren't as comfy in my no AC home).  These pants toe the line between mom-pants (especially the hem that circles my butt) but these are innocuous enough to wear with tank top and do errands.  The fabric seems very high quality - held it up to the light and very little light goes thru (i.e. more on the heavy fabric side, not thin).  I was looking for something a bit more airy since it's freakin' hot out there -- but I like the price, quality, and the fact they have sun protection enough to keep 'em!!!  I'll update my review if it doesn't wash/wear well.Overall, highly recommend if you're more along the comfy, frumpy, sport look!!  I'm 5' and ordered the regular length as I didn't want it to high my ankle by be full length -- and viola it worked!!!

These really are true to size unless you like them very roomy. By no means are they skin tight but perfect fit. I’m 5’3 and 118 and got the petite small after returning the regular medium. The P small is perfect. Lots of room but don’t make me look dumpy. The length is just at my ankle so it’s ideal. The petite is really in the length and the seat fit etc is normal for a small. I’m ordering more S they are super cute and lightweight but not paper thin.. these are indeed the perfect pant!! ** one caveat: the solid black run small so size up one. The waist is smaller than the camo color. So I bought a med petite.
I bought two.  They are durable and so comfortable especially over my menopause pouch!  I’m 5’3 and wanted an above ankle length.  These are awesome

Love these pants!  I'm 5'5" and a medium.  I bought regular length and petite.  Reg fits like reg pants and petite fit like ankle length.  Will wear petite length with sandals or sneakers in the Spring and Summer. They look great and are really comfortable.  Highly recommend.

评论概述: Great dupe! Better than expensive pair.
评论详情: I’m 5’2 120lbs. I bought a Small Petite and it’s perfect. Doesn’t not cling to my thighs. I bought 2 pair and wish the petite came in more colors. I like this better than a similar pair of pants from Athleta. All I want to wear are these pants.

评论概述: This pant can be used for everything!
评论详情: I bought these pants for hiking but can double up a a dressier pair of pants for dinner which makes them perfect for traveling.  They don't wrinkle and have a silky nylon texture and are good for cold or hot weather.  The elastic waist is a little tight, length is ankle weight.  133 pounds, 5'2"" size medium.  They wash well and I hang dry them.
These pants are comfortable and if you’re under 5’4” they fit very well.

I love the way these fit me compared to all the other styles on Amazon! I wish they would make more colors so I could buy them. I have bought many different kinds because of the pretty colors offered but they don’t fit or look as great on me as these. MORE COLORS!

I literally have 5 or 6 of these. I wear them to the office with nice blouses and I also wear them to the gym as well. They're really soft and comfortable. My only note is I think the material is ever so slightly different between a couple of pairs (but they are all Large Petite) so I don't know if they changed suppliers or something, but they're still great. Just a couple pairs feel maybe slightly thinner in material?
Love the product. Runs big. Mine were previously owned. Drawstring missing and tag torn off. Returning for a smaller unused item.

I can’t even begin to tell you how awesome these joggers are. That the fabric is perfection - everything fit perfectly and these joggers honestly you could take from the gym to an evening out they are that wonderful. Look no more. These are the ones that you need. Thank you Jesus!  I truly love them. Was a a business conference recently in DC and received multiple compliments. These joggers took me from my flight to night and back to flight home. So AMAZING!!! For reference: I am 5’3, 117 lbs and ordered a small petite.

评论概述: Great pants, but the sizing is all over the place
评论详情: I'm typically a small in everything, but these pants were big.  OK if slouchy is what I was looking for.  I also bought them in another color, same size small, and that pair is a little tight.  I'd say that there is at least a full size difference between the two pairs, both marked "small."  So sizing is a crap shoot.  If you need these pants in a hurry, buy two sizes and keep the one that fits best.  It's wasteful, but the seller should really have better quality control.
Definitely size up on these.

评论概述: Great for people who have to work but like comfort and sweat resistance
评论详情: My big butt may make these look slightly less professional than they could but if you don’t have a badonk you’ll be fine with your normal size. The material is super stretchy and lightweight. I wear these when I have to do outdoor work events in 80 degrees and while I sweat anyway, bc that’s who I am as a person, it’s by no fault of these pants which keep me much cooler than others would. no one knows though bc the sweat doesn’t show (100% tmi). I have them in blue and black and might need to buy more.
I’ve had these in my cart for years and I finally bought them. Wish I had not waited. Now I need them in more colors! I’m 5’4” and 118 pounds. I ordered the small petite and they fit perfectly!

评论概述: The material and color is *chefs kiss*
评论详情: Love the material, it’s cooling, smooth and a beautiful color. Love the stitching and loose straight fit. I think it’ll do wonderfully as an athleisure pant during the hot summer. Bought 2!

I kinda like these and will probably keep them, they actually look really good on, but they are so lightweight, they feel strange on and are very staticy.  We have dogs and the super light nylon material attracts dog hair like a magnet.  I can see myself wearing these on a flight, but being constantly bothered by the hair and lint on them.  I'm conflicted about whether to keep them.

These are easily nice as my Athleta or Gap pants of the same quality, that I paid three times as much for! They are a little heavier weight but I must admit, I am impressed. Very comfortable, that new light, silky, parachute-y kind of fabric, good weight for travel or working out or casual shopping with a light blouse and jean jacket. No real wrinkling. I am taking them on my trip to Europe to wear sightseeing and on the plane. I figure I can rinse them out, although I don't think I will have to, they aren't prone to wrinkling because of the fabric. However, watch the fit. I am an 8 in most pants and jeans, but bought the large in these based on other reviews. They fit perfectly. Medium would have been too small. I am 5'6" and 150 lbs, these reach my ankle at a stylish length.

I didn’t expect to like these pants as much as I do! The fit is really flattering and they feel like pajama pants, but you can get the look of athletic pants or business-casual slacks depending on your top/shoes/styling. They’re a stretchy athletic material but don’t make that “swish” sound when you walk, thankfully.  I’m 5’9”, 180lbs, usually a size 10/12 in pants and purchased a Large. I carry weight in my midsection and my legs are the slimmest part of my frame. These pants fit comfortably over my waist and midsection without digging in, and they’re not baggy on my legs. A true unicorn fit for me!

I wanted to like them as I thought some comfy pants that could be nice for travel would be a nice addition in my closet.  They fit fine, but I like ankle length pants -- these were not.  Since I am not as tall as the model in the photo, these hit just at the top of my shoes -- too long for ankle length and too short to be normal length.  The stretch was fine, they were not stretchy like I like for travel pants.  I want something to fit and then move a bit when I want to move.  These were not. So back they went.

These pants arrived promptly in Olive color. I was like,”Do i really need another pair of pants?” I tried them on, Yesssss, yess I do need these. The fit is spectacular. So flattering, yet comfortable. Not sheer but lightweight.  I was looking to have something I can work out in and go to grocery store afterwards, or to work. These will be much nicer than leggings. They appeared ankle length in pic but on me (5’4”) the were full length. I am a true large and the large was perfect. Will probably get them in another color too.

I bought these for golf and travel.  Hot days my skin was soaked and felt like everyone could see how much a was sweating!!  Wrinkled horrible, especially for packing.  Size was good, length I wasn’t picky about could have been shorter or longer
